original_text: The name of the first is Pison: that is it which compasseth the whole land of Havilah, where there is gold;
korean_text: 첫째의 이름은 비손이라 금이 있는 하윌라 온 땅을 둘렀으며

sentences.original_text: The name of the first is Pison
that is it which compasseth the whole land of Havilah
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하윌라 온 땅을 둘러싸는 강이다
